            text-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(255, 140, 0, 0.3);
        }

        .progress-text .label {

        body.dark-mode .label { color: #ccc; }

        .bottle {

        .bottle:active {

        .bottle.completed {

        }

        @keyframes bottleComplete {
            0% { transform: scale(1); }
            50% { transform: scale(1.1) rotate(5deg); }

        }

        @keyframes pour {
            0% { transform: translateY(-20px); opacity: 0.5; }
            50% { opacity: 1; }
            100% { transform: translateY(0); opacity: 1; }
        }

        .controls {
            display: flex;

        .btn:active {

        @media (min-width: 769px) {

        .btn-primary { background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%); }

<body class="dark-mode">
    <div class="game-container">
        <div class="header">
            <h1> CANDLE CHALLENGE </h1>
            <p class="subtitle">Light All Candles by Completing Each Color</p>
            <div class="difficulty-badge" id="difficultyBadge">Medium Challenge</div>
            <p class="instagram-tag">Follow: <a href="https://instagram.com/orouk.sami" target="_blank">@orouk.sami</a></p>
        </div>

        <div class="main-game-area">
            <div class="candle-section">
                <div class="candle-title"> Light the Candles </div>
                <div class="candles-container" id="candlesContainer"></div>
                <div class="progress-text">
                    <div class="big-number" id="litCount">0/?</div>
                    <div class="label">Candles Lit</div>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div class="game-section">
                <div class="game-header">
                    <h2> Sort the Potions</h2>
                    <p>Complete each color to light a candle!</p>
                </div>

                <div class="game-stats">
                    <div class="stat">
                        <div class="stat-value" id="moveCount">0</div>
                        <div class="stat-label">Moves</div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="stat">
                        <div class="stat-value" id="completedCount">0</div>
                        <div class="stat-label">Completed</div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="stat">
                        <div class="stat-value" id="timeDisplay">0:00</div>
                        <div class="stat-label">Time</div>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <div class="bottles-grid" id="bottlesGrid"></div>

                <div class="controls">
                    <button class="btn btn-success" onclick="checkProgress()"> Check</button>
                    <button class="btn btn-primary" onclick="undoMove()"> Undo</button>
                    <button class="btn btn-warning" onclick="resetGame()"> Reset</button>
                    <button class="btn btn-back" onclick="goBack()"> Back</button>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <div class="celebration-overlay" id="celebrationOverlay" onclick="hideCelebration()">
        <div class="celebration-card">
            <div class="celebration-content">
                <h2> ALL CANDLES LIT! </h2>
                <div class="candles-lit" id="celebrationCandles"></div>
                <p>You completed the challenge!</p>
                <p style="font-size: clamp(0.9em, 3vw, 1.2em);">Moves: <span id="finalMoves">0</span> | Time: <span id="finalTime">0:00</span></p>
                <div class="share-buttons">
                    <button class="btn btn-warning" onclick="shareToInstagram()"> Share</button>
                    <button class="btn btn-success" onclick="tryAgain()"> Again</button>
                    <button class="btn btn-back" onclick="goBack()"> Back</button>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <script>
        const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
        const difficulty = urlParams.get('difficulty') || 'medium';

        const difficultySettings = {
            easy: { colors: 3, emptyBottles: 2, label: 'Easy Challenge' },
            medium: { colors: 5, emptyBottles: 2, label: 'Medium Challenge' },
            hard: { colors: 8, emptyBottles: 3, label: 'Hard Challenge' }
        };

        const settings = difficultySettings[difficulty];
        document.getElementById('difficultyBadge').textContent = settings.label;

        let gameState = [];
        let selectedBottle = null;
        let moveCount = 0;
        let completedBottles = 0;
        let litCandles = 0;
        let moveHistory = [];
        let startTime = Date.now();
        let timerInterval;
        let totalCandles = settings.colors;

        const colors = [
            '#FF6B6B', '#4ECDC4', '#45B7D1', '#FFA07A', 
            '#98D8C8', '#F7DC6F', '#BB8FCE', '#85C1E2',
            '#F8B500', '#E74C3C', '#3498DB', '#2ECC71'
        ];

        function initGame() {
            const candlesContainer = document.getElementById('candlesContainer');
            candlesContainer.innerHTML = '';
            
            const usedColors = colors.slice(0, settings.colors);
            
            usedColors.forEach((color, index) => {
                const wrapper = document.createElement('div');
                wrapper.className = 'candle-wrapper';
                wrapper.innerHTML = `
                    <div class="candle" id="candle${index + 1}">
                        <div class="candle-color" style="background-color: ${color};"></div>
                        <div class="flame"></div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="candle-label">Candle ${index + 1}</div>
                `;
                candlesContainer.appendChild(wrapper);
            });

            gameState = [];
            const allLayers = [];
            usedColors.forEach(color => {
                for (let i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
                    allLayers.push(color);
                }
            });

            for (let i = allLayers.length - 1; i > 0; i--) {
                const j = Math.floor(Math.random() * (i + 1));
                [allLayers[i], allLayers[j]] = [allLayers[j], allLayers[i]];
            }

            for (let i = 0; i < settings.colors; i++) {
                gameState.push([
                    allLayers[i * 4],
                    allLayers[i * 4 + 1],
                    allLayers[i * 4 + 2],
                    allLayers[i * 4 + 3]
                ]);
            }

            for (let i = 0; i < settings.emptyBottles; i++) {
                gameState.push([]);
            }

            renderBottles();
            
            moveCount = 0;
            completedBottles = 0;
            litCandles = 0;
            moveHistory = [];
            selectedBottle = null;
            
            updateStats();
            startTimer();
        }

        function renderBottles() {
            const grid = document.getElementById('bottlesGrid');
            grid.innerHTML = '';

            gameState.forEach((bottle, bottleIndex) => {
                const bottleDiv = document.createElement('div');
                bottleDiv.className = 'bottle';
                bottleDiv.dataset.index = bottleIndex;
                bottleDiv.onclick = () => selectBottle(bottleIndex);

                if (isBottleComplete(bottle)) {
                    bottleDiv.classList.add('completed');
                }

                bottle.forEach((color) => {
                    const layer = document.createElement('div');
                    layer.className = 'liquid-layer';
                    layer.style.backgroundColor = color;
                    bottleDiv.appendChild(layer);
                });

                grid.appendChild(bottleDiv);
            });
        }

        function selectBottle(index) {
            const bottle = gameState[index];
            
            if (selectedBottle === null) {
                if (bottle.length > 0) {
                    selectedBottle = index;
                    document.querySelectorAll('.bottle')[index].classList.add('selected');
                }
            } else {
                if (selectedBottle === index) {
                    document.querySelectorAll('.bottle')[selectedBottle].classList.remove('selected');
                    selectedBottle = null;
                } else {
                    pourPotion(selectedBottle, index);
                    document.querySelectorAll('.bottle')[selectedBottle].classList.remove('selected');
                    selectedBottle = null;
                }
            }
        }

        function pourPotion(fromIndex, toIndex) {
            const fromBottle = gameState[fromIndex];
            const toBottle = gameState[toIndex];

            if (fromBottle.length === 0) return;
            if (toBottle.length >= 4) return;

            const topColorFrom = fromBottle[fromBottle.length - 1];
            
            if (toBottle.length > 0) {
                const topColorTo = toBottle[toBottle.length - 1];
                if (topColorFrom !== topColorTo) return;
            }

            let countToPour = 1;
            for (let i = fromBottle.length - 2; i >= 0; i--) {
                if (fromBottle[i] === topColorFrom) {
                    countToPour++;
                } else {
                    break;
                }
            }

            const spaceAvailable = 4 - toBottle.length;
            countToPour = Math.min(countToPour, spaceAvailable);

            moveHistory.push(JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(gameState)));

            for (let i = 0; i < countToPour; i++) {
                const colorToPour = fromBottle.pop();
                toBottle.push(colorToPour);
            }

            moveCount++;
            updateStats();
            renderBottles();

            setTimeout(() => {
                const targetBottle = document.querySelectorAll('.bottle')[toIndex];
                const layers = targetBottle.querySelectorAll('.liquid-layer');
                for (let i = 0; i < countToPour; i++) {
                    if (layers[layers.length - 1 - i]) {
                        layers[layers.length - 1 - i].classList.add('pouring');
                    }
                }
            }, 10);

            checkCompletion();
        }

        function isBottleComplete(bottle) {
            if (bottle.length === 0) return false;
            if (bottle.length !== 4) return false;
            const firstColor = bottle[0];
            return bottle.every(color => color === firstColor);
        }

        function checkCompletion() {
            const completed = gameState.filter(bottle => isBottleComplete(bottle)).length;
            
            if (completed > completedBottles) {
                completedBottles = completed;
                litCandles = completed;
                updateStats();
                lightCandle(completed);
                
                if (completed === totalCandles) {
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        turnBright();
                        setTimeout(showCelebration, 1000);
                    }, 500);
                }
            }
        }

        function lightCandle(number) {
            const candle = document.getElementById('candle' + number);
            if (candle && !candle.classList.contains('lit')) {
                candle.classList.add('lit');
                createSparkles(candle);
            }
        }

        function turnBright() {
            document.body.classList.remove('dark-mode');
            document.body.classList.add('bright-mode');
        }

        function createSparkles(candle) {
            const rect = candle.getBoundingClientRect();
            for (let i = 0; i < 20; i++) {
                const particle = document.createElement('div');
                particle.className = 'particle';
                particle.style.left = (rect.left + rect.width / 2) + 'px';
                particle.style.top = rect.top + 'px';
                particle.style.width = '5px';
                particle.style.height = '5px';
                particle.style.background = ['#FFD700', '#FFA500', '#FF6347'][Math.floor(Math.random() * 3)];
                particle.style.borderRadius = '50%';
                particle.style.animation = `particleFall ${1 + Math.random()}s ease-out forwards`;
                particle.style.transform = `translateX(${(Math.random() - 0.5) * 100}px)`;
                document.body.appendChild(particle);
                setTimeout(() => particle.remove(), 2000);
            }
        }

        function updateStats() {
            document.getElementById('moveCount').textContent = moveCount;
            document.getElementById('completedCount').textContent = completedBottles;
            document.getElementById('litCount').textContent = litCandles + '/' + totalCandles;
        }

        function startTimer() {
            if (timerInterval) clearInterval(timerInterval);
            startTime = Date.now();
            timerInterval = setInterval(() => {
                const elapsed = Math.floor((Date.now() - startTime) / 1000);
                const minutes = Math.floor(elapsed / 60);
                const seconds = elapsed % 60;
                document.getElementById('timeDisplay').textContent = 
                    `${minutes}:${seconds.toString().padStart(2, '0')}`;
            }, 1000);
        }

        function checkProgress() {
            if (completedBottles === 0) {
                alert(' No candles lit yet! Keep sorting!');
            } else if (completedBottles === totalCandles) {
                alert(' All candles lit! You won!');
            } else {
                alert(` ${completedBottles}/${totalCandles} candles lit!\n\n${totalCandles - completedBottles} more to go!`);
            }
        }

        function undoMove() {
            if (moveHistory.length > 0) {
                gameState = moveHistory.pop();
                moveCount = Math.max(0, moveCount - 1);
                
                const completed = gameState.filter(bottle => isBottleComplete(bottle)).length;
                completedBottles = completed;
                litCandles = completed;
                
                for (let i = 1; i <= totalCandles; i++) {
                    const candle = document.getElementById('candle' + i);
                    if (candle) {
                        if (i <= litCandles) {
                            candle.classList.add('lit');
                        } else {
                            candle.classList.remove('lit');
                        }
                    }
                }
                
                if (litCandles < totalCandles) {
                    document.body.classList.remove('bright-mode');
                    document.body.classList.add('dark-mode');
                }
                
                renderBottles();
                updateStats();
            }
        }

        function resetGame() {
            if (confirm('Reset? You will lose progress!')) {
                document.body.classList.remove('bright-mode');
                document.body.classList.add('dark-mode');
                initGame();
            }
        }

        function tryAgain() {
            hideCelebration();
            document.body.classList.remove('bright-mode');
            document.body.classList.add('dark-mode');
            initGame();
        }

        function showCelebration() {
            clearInterval(timerInterval);
            document.getElementById('finalMoves').textContent = moveCount;
            document.getElementById('finalTime').textContent = document.getElementById('timeDisplay').textContent;
            
            let candleEmojis = '';
            for (let i = 0; i < totalCandles; i++) {
                candleEmojis += '';
                if ((i + 1) % 6 === 0 && i !== totalCandles - 1) candleEmojis += '<br>';
            }
            document.getElementById('celebrationCandles').innerHTML = candleEmojis;
            
            document.getElementById('celebrationOverlay').classList.add('show');
            
            for (let i = 0; i < 50; i++) {
                setTimeout(() => {
                    const particle = document.createElement('div');
                    particle.textContent = ['', '', '', '', ''][Math.floor(Math.random() * 5)];
                    particle.className = 'particle';
                    particle.style.left = Math.random() * window.innerWidth + 'px';
                    particle.style.top = '-50px';
                    particle.style.fontSize = (20 + Math.random() * 20) + 'px';
                    particle.style.animation = `particleFall ${2 + Math.random() * 2}s linear forwards`;
                    document.body.appendChild(particle);
                    setTimeout(() => particle.remove(), 4000);
                }, i * 30);
            }
        }

        function hideCelebration() {
            document.getElementById('celebrationOverlay').classList.remove('show');
        }

        function shareToInstagram() {
            const text = `I lit all ${totalCandles} candles in the ${settings.label}! \n\nMoves: ${moveCount}\nTime: ${document.getElementById('timeDisplay').textContent}\n\nCan you beat me?\n\n@orouk.sami #PotionSort #CandleChallenge`;
            
            if (navigator.share) {
                navigator.share({
                    title: 'Candle Challenge',
                    text: text,
                    url: window.location.href
                }).catch(() => {});
            } else {
                alert(' Share this:\n\n' + text);
            }
        }

        function goBack() {
            if (window.history.length > 1) {
                window.history.back();
            } else {
                window.location.href = '/';
            }
        }

        initGame();
    </script>
</body>
</html>

        @media (min-width: 769px) {
            .game-section {
                padding: 40px;
            }
        }

        body.dark-mode .game-section {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95);
        }

        body.bright-mode .game-section {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.98);
        }

        .game-header {
            text-align: center;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }

        }

        .stat-value {
            font-size: clamp(1.5em, 5vw, 2em);

            font-weight: bold;
        }

        .stat-label {
            color: #666;
            font-size: clamp(0.75em, 3vw, 0.9em);
            margin-top: 3px;
        }

        .bottles-grid {
            display: flex;

            flex-wrap: wrap;

            min-height: 150px;
        }

        .bottle {
            width: clamp(50px, 12vw, 70px);

            position: relative;

            transition: all 0.3s ease;

            display: flex;

        }

        .bottle:active {

        }

        @media (min-width: 769px) {

            }
        }

        .bottle.selected {
            border-color: #FFD700;
            box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.8);
            transform: translateY(-8px) scale(1.05);
        }

        .bottle.completed {
            border-color: #4CAF50;
            animation: bottleComplete 1s ease;
        }

        @keyframes bottleComplete {
            0% { transform: scale(1); }
            50% { transform: scale(1.1) rotate(5deg); }
            100% { transform: scale(1) rotate(0deg); }
        }

        .liquid-layer {
            width: 100%;

        .liquid-layer.pouring {
            animation: pour 0.8s ease-out;
        }

        @keyframes pour {
            0% { transform: translateY(-20px); opacity: 0.5; }
            50% { opacity: 1; }
            100% { transform: translateY(0); opacity: 1; }
        }

        .controls {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            gap: clamp(8px, 2vw, 15px);
            flex-wrap: wrap;

        }

        .btn {
            padding: clamp(10px, 3vw, 15px) clamp(15px, 4vw, 30px);
            border: none;

            font-size: clamp(0.9em, 3vw, 1.1em);
            font-weight: bold;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            color: white;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
            touch-action: manipulation;
        }

        .btn:active {
            transform: scale(0.95);
        }

        @media (min-width: 769px) {
            .btn:hover {

        .btn-primary { background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%); }

        .celebration-overlay {

        }

        .celebration-card {

        .celebration-content {

<body class="dark-mode">
    <div class="game-container">
        <div class="header">
            <h1> CANDLE CHALLENGE </h1>
            <p class="subtitle">Light All Candles by Completing Each Color</p>
            <div class="difficulty-badge" id="difficultyBadge">Medium Challenge</div>
            <p class="instagram-tag">Follow: <a href="https://instagram.com/orouk.sami" target="_blank">@orouk.sami</a></p>
        </div>

        <div class="main-game-area">
            <div class="candle-section">
                <div class="candle-title"> Light the Candles </div>
                <div class="candles-container" id="candlesContainer"></div>
                <div class="progress-text">
                    <div class="big-number" id="litCount">0/?</div>
                    <div class="label">Candles Lit</div>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div class="game-section">
                <div class="game-header">
                    <h2> Sort the Potions</h2>
                    <p>Complete each color to light a candle!</p>
                </div>

                <div class="game-stats">
                    <div class="stat">
                        <div class="stat-value" id="moveCount">0</div>
                        <div class="stat-label">Moves</div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="stat">
                        <div class="stat-value" id="completedCount">0</div>
                        <div class="stat-label">Completed</div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="stat">
                        <div class="stat-value" id="timeDisplay">0:00</div>
                        <div class="stat-label">Time</div>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <div class="bottles-grid" id="bottlesGrid"></div>

                <div class="controls">
                    <button class="btn btn-success" onclick="checkProgress()"> Check</button>
                    <button class="btn btn-primary" onclick="undoMove()"> Undo</button>
                    <button class="btn btn-warning" onclick="resetGame()"> Reset</button>
                    <button class="btn btn-back" onclick="goBack()"> Back</button>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <div class="celebration-overlay" id="celebrationOverlay" onclick="hideCelebration()">
        <div class="celebration-card">
            <div class="celebration-content">
                <h2> ALL CANDLES LIT! </h2>
                <div class="candles-lit" id="celebrationCandles"></div>
                <p>You completed the challenge!</p>
                <p style="font-size: clamp(0.9em, 3vw, 1.2em);">Moves: <span id="finalMoves">0</span> | Time: <span id="finalTime">0:00</span></p>
                <div class="share-buttons">
                    <button class="btn btn-warning" onclick="shareToInstagram()"> Share</button>
                    <button class="btn btn-success" onclick="tryAgain()"> Again</button>
                    <button class="btn btn-back" onclick="goBack()"> Back</button>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <script>
        const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
        const difficulty = urlParams.get('difficulty') || 'medium';

        const difficultySettings = {
            easy: { colors: 3, emptyBottles: 2, label: 'Easy Challenge' },
            medium: { colors: 5, emptyBottles: 2, label: 'Medium Challenge' },
            hard: { colors: 8, emptyBottles: 3, label: 'Hard Challenge' }
        };

        const settings = difficultySettings[difficulty];
        document.getElementById('difficultyBadge').textContent = settings.label;

        let gameState = [];
        let selectedBottle = null;
        let moveCount = 0;
        let completedBottles = 0;
        let litCandles = 0;
        let moveHistory = [];
        let startTime = Date.now();
        let timerInterval;
        let totalCandles = settings.colors;

        const colors = [
            '#FF6B6B', '#4ECDC4', '#45B7D1', '#FFA07A', 
            '#98D8C8', '#F7DC6F', '#BB8FCE', '#85C1E2',
            '#F8B500', '#E74C3C', '#3498DB', '#2ECC71'
        ];

        function initGame() {
            const candlesContainer = document.getElementById('candlesContainer');
            candlesContainer.innerHTML = '';
            
            const usedColors = colors.slice(0, settings.colors);
            
            usedColors.forEach((color, index) => {
                const wrapper = document.createElement('div');
                wrapper.className = 'candle-wrapper';
                wrapper.innerHTML = `
                    <div class="candle" id="candle${index + 1}">
                        <div class="candle-color" style="background-color: ${color};"></div>
                        <div class="flame"></div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="candle-label">Candle ${index + 1}</div>
                `;
                candlesContainer.appendChild(wrapper);
            });

            gameState = [];
            const allLayers = [];
            usedColors.forEach(color => {
                for (let i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
                    allLayers.push(color);
                }
            });

            for (let i = allLayers.length - 1; i > 0; i--) {
                const j = Math.floor(Math.random() * (i + 1));
                [allLayers[i], allLayers[j]] = [allLayers[j], allLayers[i]];
            }

            for (let i = 0; i < settings.colors; i++) {
                gameState.push([
                    allLayers[i * 4],
                    allLayers[i * 4 + 1],
                    allLayers[i * 4 + 2],
                    allLayers[i * 4 + 3]
                ]);
            }

            for (let i = 0; i < settings.emptyBottles; i++) {
                gameState.push([]);
            }

            renderBottles();
            
            moveCount = 0;
            completedBottles = 0;
            litCandles = 0;
            moveHistory = [];
            selectedBottle = null;
            
            updateStats();
            startTimer();
        }

        function renderBottles() {
            const grid = document.getElementById('bottlesGrid');
            grid.innerHTML = '';

            gameState.forEach((bottle, bottleIndex) => {
                const bottleDiv = document.createElement('div');
                bottleDiv.className = 'bottle';
                bottleDiv.dataset.index = bottleIndex;
                bottleDiv.onclick = () => selectBottle(bottleIndex);

                if (isBottleComplete(bottle)) {
                    bottleDiv.classList.add('completed');
                }

                bottle.forEach((color) => {
                    const layer = document.createElement('div');
                    layer.className = 'liquid-layer';
                    layer.style.backgroundColor = color;
                    bottleDiv.appendChild(layer);
                });

                grid.appendChild(bottleDiv);
            });
        }

        function selectBottle(index) {
            const bottle = gameState[index];
            
            if (selectedBottle === null) {
                if (bottle.length > 0) {
                    selectedBottle = index;
                    document.querySelectorAll('.bottle')[index].classList.add('selected');
                }
            } else {
                if (selectedBottle === index) {
                    document.querySelectorAll('.bottle')[selectedBottle].classList.remove('selected');
                    selectedBottle = null;
                } else {
                    pourPotion(selectedBottle, index);
                    document.querySelectorAll('.bottle')[selectedBottle].classList.remove('selected');
                    selectedBottle = null;
                }
            }
        }

        function pourPotion(fromIndex, toIndex) {
            const fromBottle = gameState[fromIndex];
            const toBottle = gameState[toIndex];

            if (fromBottle.length === 0) return;
            if (toBottle.length >= 4) return;

            const topColorFrom = fromBottle[fromBottle.length - 1];
            
            if (toBottle.length > 0) {
                const topColorTo = toBottle[toBottle.length - 1];
                if (topColorFrom !== topColorTo) return;
            }

            let countToPour = 1;
            for (let i = fromBottle.length - 2; i >= 0; i--) {
                if (fromBottle[i] === topColorFrom) {
                    countToPour++;
                } else {
                    break;
                }
            }

            const spaceAvailable = 4 - toBottle.length;
            countToPour = Math.min(countToPour, spaceAvailable);

            moveHistory.push(JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(gameState)));

            for (let i = 0; i < countToPour; i++) {
                const colorToPour = fromBottle.pop();
                toBottle.push(colorToPour);
            }

            moveCount++;
            updateStats();
            renderBottles();

            setTimeout(() => {
                const targetBottle = document.querySelectorAll('.bottle')[toIndex];
                const layers = targetBottle.querySelectorAll('.liquid-layer');
                for (let i = 0; i < countToPour; i++) {
                    if (layers[layers.length - 1 - i]) {
                        layers[layers.length - 1 - i].classList.add('pouring');
                    }
                }
            }, 10);

            checkCompletion();
        }

        function isBottleComplete(bottle) {
            if (bottle.length === 0) return false;
            if (bottle.length !== 4) return false;
            const firstColor = bottle[0];
            return bottle.every(color => color === firstColor);
        }

        function checkCompletion() {
            const completed = gameState.filter(bottle => isBottleComplete(bottle)).length;
            
            if (completed > completedBottles) {
                completedBottles = completed;
                litCandles = completed;
                updateStats();
                lightCandle(completed);
                
                if (completed === totalCandles) {
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        turnBright();
                        setTimeout(showCelebration, 1000);
                    }, 500);
                }
            }
        }

        function lightCandle(number) {
            const candle = document.getElementById('candle' + number);
            if (candle && !candle.classList.contains('lit')) {
                candle.classList.add('lit');
                createSparkles(candle);
            }
        }

        function turnBright() {
            document.body.classList.remove('dark-mode');
            document.body.classList.add('bright-mode');
        }

        function createSparkles(candle) {
            const rect = candle.getBoundingClientRect();
            for (let i = 0; i < 20; i++) {
                const particle = document.createElement('div');
                particle.className = 'particle';
                particle.style.left = (rect.left + rect.width / 2) + 'px';
                particle.style.top = rect.top + 'px';
                particle.style.width = '5px';
                particle.style.height = '5px';
                particle.style.background = ['#FFD700', '#FFA500', '#FF6347'][Math.floor(Math.random() * 3)];
                particle.style.borderRadius = '50%';
                particle.style.animation = `particleFall ${1 + Math.random()}s ease-out forwards`;
                particle.style.transform = `translateX(${(Math.random() - 0.5) * 100}px)`;
                document.body.appendChild(particle);
                setTimeout(() => particle.remove(), 2000);
            }
        }

        function updateStats() {
            document.getElementById('moveCount').textContent = moveCount;
            document.getElementById('completedCount').textContent = completedBottles;
            document.getElementById('litCount').textContent = litCandles + '/' + totalCandles;
        }

        function startTimer() {
            if (timerInterval) clearInterval(timerInterval);
            startTime = Date.now();
            timerInterval = setInterval(() => {
                const elapsed = Math.floor((Date.now() - startTime) / 1000);
                const minutes = Math.floor(elapsed / 60);
                const seconds = elapsed % 60;
                document.getElementById('timeDisplay').textContent = 
                    `${minutes}:${seconds.toString().padStart(2, '0')}`;
            }, 1000);
        }

        function checkProgress() {
            if (completedBottles === 0) {
                alert(' No candles lit yet! Keep sorting!');
            } else if (completedBottles === totalCandles) {
                alert(' All candles lit! You won!');
            } else {
                alert(` ${completedBottles}/${totalCandles} candles lit!\n\n${totalCandles - completedBottles} more to go!`);
            }
        }

        function undoMove() {
            if (moveHistory.length > 0) {
                gameState = moveHistory.pop();
                moveCount = Math.max(0, moveCount - 1);
                
                const completed = gameState.filter(bottle => isBottleComplete(bottle)).length;
                completedBottles = completed;
                litCandles = completed;
                
                for (let i = 1; i <= totalCandles; i++) {
                    const candle = document.getElementById('candle' + i);
                    if (candle) {
                        if (i <= litCandles) {
                            candle.classList.add('lit');
                        } else {
                            candle.classList.remove('lit');
                        }
                    }
                }
                
                if (litCandles < totalCandles) {
                    document.body.classList.remove('bright-mode');
                    document.body.classList.add('dark-mode');
                }
                
                renderBottles();
                updateStats();
            }
        }

        function resetGame() {
            if (confirm('Reset? You will lose progress!')) {
                document.body.classList.remove('bright-mode');
                document.body.classList.add('dark-mode');
                initGame();
            }
        }

        function tryAgain() {
            hideCelebration();
            document.body.classList.remove('bright-mode');
            document.body.classList.add('dark-mode');
            initGame();
        }

        function showCelebration() {
            clearInterval(timerInterval);
            document.getElementById('finalMoves').textContent = moveCount;
            document.getElementById('finalTime').textContent = document.getElementById('timeDisplay').textContent;
            
            let candleEmojis = '';
            for (let i = 0; i < totalCandles; i++) {
                candleEmojis += '';
                if ((i + 1) % 6 === 0 && i !== totalCandles - 1) candleEmojis += '<br>';
            }
            document.getElementById('celebrationCandles').innerHTML = candleEmojis;
            
            document.getElementById('celebrationOverlay').classList.add('show');
            
            for (let i = 0; i < 50; i++) {
                setTimeout(() => {
                    const particle = document.createElement('div');
                    particle.textContent = ['', '', '', '', ''][Math.floor(Math.random() * 5)];
                    particle.className = 'particle';
                    particle.style.left = Math.random() * window.innerWidth + 'px';
                    particle.style.top = '-50px';
                    particle.style.fontSize = (20 + Math.random() * 20) + 'px';
                    particle.style.animation = `particleFall ${2 + Math.random() * 2}s linear forwards`;
                    document.body.appendChild(particle);
                    setTimeout(() => particle.remove(), 4000);
                }, i * 30);
            }
        }

        function hideCelebration() {
            document.getElementById('celebrationOverlay').classList.remove('show');
        }

        function shareToInstagram() {
            const text = `I lit all ${totalCandles} candles in the ${settings.label}! \n\nMoves: ${moveCount}\nTime: ${document.getElementById('timeDisplay').textContent}\n\nCan you beat me?\n\n@orouk.sami #PotionSort #CandleChallenge`;
            
            if (navigator.share) {
                navigator.share({
                    title: 'Candle Challenge',
                    text: text,
                    url: window.location.href
                }).catch(() => {});
            } else {
                alert(' Share this:\n\n' + text);
            }
        }

        function goBack() {
            if (window.history.length > 1) {
                window.history.back();
            } else {
                window.location.href = '/';
            }
        }

        initGame();
    </script>
</body>
</html>

import { useState } from 'react';
import Settings from './Settings';
import About from './About';
import Privacy from './Privacy';
import QRGenerator from './QRGenerator';
import LevelSelect from './LevelSelect';

interface HomeProps {
  onStartGame: (level?: number) => void;
}

export default function Home({ onStartGame }: HomeProps) {
  const [showSettings, setShowSettings] = useState(false);
  const [showAbout, setShowAbout] = useState(false);
  const [showPrivacy, setShowPrivacy] = useState(false);
  const [showQR, setShowQR] = useState(false);
  const [showLevelSelect, setShowLevelSelect] = useState(false);

  if (showSettings) return <Settings onClose={() => setShowSettings(false)} />;
  if (showAbout) return <About onBack={() => setShowAbout(false)} />;
  if (showPrivacy) return <Privacy onBack={() => setShowPrivacy(false)} />;
  if (showQR) return <QRGenerator onBack={() => setShowQR(false)} />;
  if (showLevelSelect) return <LevelSelect onSelectLevel={(level) => { setShowLevelSelect(false); onStartGame(level); }} onBack={() => setShowLevelSelect(false)} currentLevel={1} />;

  return (
    <div style={{
      minHeight: '100vh',
      background: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%)',
      display: 'flex',
      flexDirection: 'column',
      alignItems: 'center',
      justifyContent: 'center',
      padding: '20px',
      textAlign: 'center'
    }}>
      <h1 style={{
        fontSize: 'clamp(2.5rem, 8vw, 5rem)',
        color: 'white',
        margin: '0 0 20px 0',
        textShadow: '0 4px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.3)',
        fontWeight: 'bold'
      }}>
         POTION SORT
      </h1>

      <p style={{
        fontSize: 'clamp(1rem, 3vw, 1.5rem)',
        color: 'rgba(255,255,255,0.9)',
        marginBottom: '40px',
        maxWidth: '600px'
      }}>
        Sort the magical potions! Match colors to complete each level.
      </p>

      <div style={{
        display: 'flex',
        flexDirection: 'column',
        gap: '15px',
        width: '100%',
        maxWidth: '400px'
      }}>
        <button onClick={() => onStartGame()} style={{
          padding: '20px 40px',
          fontSize: '1.5rem',
          background: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #11998e, #38ef7d)',
          border: 'none',
          borderRadius: '15px',
          color: 'white',
          fontWeight: 'bold',
          cursor: 'pointer',
          boxShadow: '0 8px 30px rgba(17, 153, 142, 0.4)',
          transition: 'all 0.3s'
        }}>
           START GAME
        </button>

        {/*  CANDLE CHALLENGE BUTTON - NEW! */}
        <button onClick={() => window.location.href = '/candle-challenge.html?difficulty=medium'} style={{
          padding: '18px 35px',
          fontSize: '1.3rem',
          background: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #f093fb 0%, #f5576c 100%)',
          border: 'none',
          borderRadius: '15px',
          color: 'white',
          fontWeight: 'bold',
          cursor: 'pointer',
          boxShadow: '0 8px 30px rgba(240, 147, 251, 0.5)',
          transition: 'all 0.3s',
          animation: 'pulse 2s ease-in-out infinite'
        }}>
           CANDLE CHALLENGE
        </button>

        <button onClick={() => setShowLevelSelect(true)} style={{
          padding: '15px 30px',
          fontSize: '1.2rem',
          background: 'rgba(255,255,255,0.2)',
          border: '2px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.3)',
          borderRadius: '12px',
          color: 'white',
          fontWeight: 'bold',
          cursor: 'pointer',
          transition: 'all 0.3s'
        }}>
           SELECT LEVEL
        </button>

        <button onClick={() => setShowSettings(true)} style={{
          padding: '15px 30px',
          fontSize: '1.2rem',
          background: 'rgba(255,255,255,0.2)',
          border: '2px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.3)',
          borderRadius: '12px',
          color: 'white',
          fontWeight: 'bold',
          cursor: 'pointer',
          transition: 'all 0.3s'
        }}>
           SETTINGS
        </button>

        <button onClick={() => setShowAbout(true)} style={{
          padding: '10px 20px',
          fontSize: '1rem',
          background: 'transparent',
          border: '2px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.2)',
          borderRadius: '10px',
          color: 'white',
          cursor: 'pointer',
          transition: 'all 0.3s'
        }}>
           About
        </button>

        <button onClick={() => setShowPrivacy(true)} style={{
          padding: '10px 20px',
          fontSize: '0.9rem',
          background: 'transparent',
          border: '2px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.2)',
          borderRadius: '10px',
          color: 'white',
          cursor: 'pointer',

           Privacy

           QR Code
        </button>

        @keyframes pulse {
          0%, 100% {

    </div>
  );
}

Oh! The code ALREADY does this! Look at this part:

javascript
function isCandleComplete(candle) {
    if (candle.length === 0) return false;
    if (candle.length !== 4) return false;
    const firstColor = candle[0];
    return candle.every(color => color === firstColor);
}

And:

javascript
// Check if candle is complete (all same color)
if (isCandleComplete(candle)) {
    candleDiv.classList.add('completed');
    
    // Add flame
    const flame = document.createElement('div');
    flame.className = 'flame';
    candleDiv.appendChild(flame);
}

The flame SHOULD appear when:

  • Candle has 4 layers
  • All 4 layers are the SAME color
  • Then .completed class added Flame shows!

PART 2 of 3 - COPY THIS:

html
    <script>
        const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
        const difficulty = urlParams.get('difficulty') || 'medium';

        const difficultySettings = {
            easy: { colors: 3, emptyBottles: 2, label: 'Easy Challenge' },
            medium: { colors: 5, emptyBottles: 2, label: 'Medium Challenge' },
            hard: { colors: 8, emptyBottles: 3, label: 'Hard Challenge' }
        };

        const settings = difficultySettings[difficulty];
        document.getElementById('difficultyBadge').textContent = settings.label;

        let gameState = [];
        let selectedCandle = null;
        let moveCount = 0;
        let litCandles = 0;
        let moveHistory = [];
        let startTime = Date.now();
        let timerInterval;
        let totalCandles = settings.colors;

        const colors = [
            '#FF6B6B', '#4ECDC4', '#45B7D1', '#FFA07A', 
            '#98D8C8', '#F7DC6F', '#BB8FCE', '#85C1E2',
            '#F8B500', '#E74C3C', '#3498DB', '#2ECC71'
        ];

        function initGame() {
            gameState = [];
            const allLayers = [];
            const usedColors = colors.slice(0, settings.colors);
            
            // Create all color layers
            usedColors.forEach(color => {
                for (let i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
                    allLayers.push(color);
                }
            });

            // Shuffle
            for (let i = allLayers.length - 1; i > 0; i--) {
                const j = Math.floor(Math.random() * (i + 1));
                [allLayers[i], allLayers[j]] = [allLayers[j], allLayers[i]];
            }

            // Distribute into candles
            for (let i = 0; i < settings.colors; i++) {
                gameState.push([
                    allLayers[i * 4],
                    allLayers[i * 4 + 1],
                    allLayers[i * 4 + 2],
                    allLayers[i * 4 + 3]
                ]);
            }

            // Add empty candles
            for (let i = 0; i < settings.emptyBottles; i++) {
                gameState.push([]);
            }

            renderCandles();
            
            moveCount = 0;
            litCandles = 0;
            moveHistory = [];
            selectedCandle = null;
            
            updateStats();
            startTimer();
        }

        function renderCandles() {
            const grid = document.getElementById('candlesGrid');
            grid.innerHTML = '';

            gameState.forEach((candle, candleIndex) => {
                const candleDiv = document.createElement('div');
                candleDiv.className = 'candle';
                candleDiv.dataset.index = candleIndex;
                candleDiv.onclick = () => selectCandle(candleIndex);

                // Check if candle is complete (all same color)
                if (isCandleComplete(candle)) {
                    candleDiv.classList.add('completed');
                    
                    // Add flame
                    const flame = document.createElement('div');
                    flame.className = 'flame';
                    candleDiv.appendChild(flame);
                }

                // Add color layers from bottom to top
                candle.forEach((color) => {
                    const layer = document.createElement('div');
                    layer.className = 'color-layer';
                    layer.style.backgroundColor = color;
                    candleDiv.appendChild(layer);
                });

                grid.appendChild(candleDiv);
            });
        }

        function selectCandle(index) {
            const candle = gameState[index];
            
            if (selectedCandle === null) {
                // First selection - must have colors
                if (candle.length > 0) {
                    selectedCandle = index;
                    document.querySelectorAll('.candle')[index].classList.add('selected');
                }
            } else {
                if (selectedCandle === index) {
                    // Deselect
                    document.querySelectorAll('.candle')[selectedCandle].classList.remove('selected');
                    selectedCandle = null;
                } else {
                    // Pour from selected to this one
                    pourIntoCandle(selectedCandle, index);
                    document.querySelectorAll('.candle')[selectedCandle].classList.remove('selected');
                    selectedCandle = null;
                }
            }
        }

        function pourIntoCandle(fromIndex, toIndex) {
            const fromCandle = gameState[fromIndex];
            const toCandle = gameState[toIndex];

            if (fromCandle.length === 0) return;
            if (toCandle.length >= 4) return;

            const topColorFrom = fromCandle[fromCandle.length - 1];
            
            // Can only pour if target is empty or same color on top
            if (toCandle.length > 0) {
                const topColorTo = toCandle[toCandle.length - 1];
                if (topColorFrom !== topColorTo) return;
            }

            // Count how many same colors to pour
            let countToPour = 1;
            for (let i = fromCandle.length - 2; i >= 0; i--) {
                if (fromCandle[i] === topColorFrom) {
                    countToPour++;
                } else {
                    break;
                }
            }

            const spaceAvailable = 4 - toCandle.length;
            countToPour = Math.min(countToPour, spaceAvailable);

            // Save history for undo
            moveHistory.push(JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(gameState)));

            // Pour
            for (let i = 0; i < countToPour; i++) {
                const colorToPour = fromCandle.pop();
                toCandle.push(colorToPour);
            }

            moveCount++;
            updateStats();
            renderCandles();

            // Animate pouring
            setTimeout(() => {
                const targetCandle = document.querySelectorAll('.candle')[toIndex];
                const layers = targetCandle.querySelectorAll('.color-layer');
                for (let i = 0; i < countToPour; i++) {
                    if (layers[layers.length - 1 - i]) {
                        layers[layers.length - 1 - i].classList.add('pouring');
                    }
                }
            }, 10);

            checkCompletion();
        }

        function isCandleComplete(candle) {
            if (candle.length === 0) return false;
            if (candle.length !== 4) return false;
            const firstColor = candle[0];
            return candle.every(color => color === firstColor);
        }

        function checkCompletion() {
            const completed = gameState.filter(candle => isCandleComplete(candle)).length;
            
            if (completed > litCandles) {
                litCandles = completed;
                updateStats();
                
                // Create sparkles for newly lit candle
                const candleElements = document.querySelectorAll('.candle.completed');
                if (candleElements[litCandles - 1]) {
                    createSparkles(candleElements[litCandles - 1]);
                }
                
                // Check if all candles are lit
                if (completed === totalCandles) {
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        turnBright();
                        setTimeout(showCelebration, 1000);
                    }, 500);
                }
            }
        }

        function turnBright() {
            document.body.classList.remove('dark-mode');
            document.body.classList.add('bright-mode');
        }

        function createSparkles(candle) {
            const rect = candle.getBoundingClientRect();
            for (let i = 0; i < 30; i++) {
                const particle = document.createElement('div');
                particle.className = 'particle';
                particle.style.left = (rect.left + rect.width / 2) + 'px';
                particle.style.top = rect.top + 'px';
                particle.style.width = '8px';
                particle.style.height = '8px';
                particle.style.background = ['#FFD700', '#FFA500', '#FF6347', '#FFEB3B'][Math.floor(Math.random() * 4)];
                particle.style.borderRadius = '50%';
                particle.style.boxShadow = '0 0 10px currentColor';
                particle.style.animation = `particleFall ${1.5 + Math.random()}s ease-out forwards`;
                particle.style.transform = `translateX(${(Math.random() - 0.5) * 150}px)`;
                document.body.appendChild(particle);
                setTimeout(() => particle.remove(), 2500);
            }
        }

        function updateStats() {
            document.getElementById('moveCount').textContent = moveCount;
            document.getElementById('litCount').textContent = litCandles + '/' + totalCandles;
        }

        function startTimer() {
            if (timerInterval) clearInterval(timerInterval);
            startTime = Date.now();
            timerInterval = setInterval(() => {
                const elapsed = Math.floor((Date.now() - startTime) / 1000);
                const minutes = Math.floor(elapsed / 60);
                const seconds = elapsed % 60;
                document.getElementById('timeDisplay').textContent = 
                    `${minutes}:${seconds.toString().padStart(2, '0')}`;
            }, 1000);
        }

        function checkProgress() {
            if (litCandles === 0) {
                alert(' No candles lit yet! Keep sorting!');
            } else if (litCandles === totalCandles) {
                alert(' All candles lit! You won!');
            } else {
                alert(` ${litCandles}/${totalCandles} candles lit!\n\n${totalCandles - litCandles} more to go!`);
            }
        }

        function undoMove() {
            if (moveHistory.length > 0) {
                gameState = moveHistory.pop();
                moveCount = Math.max(0, moveCount - 1);
                
                const completed = gameState.filter(candle => isCandleComplete(candle)).length;
                litCandles = completed;
                
                if (litCandles < totalCandles) {
                    document.body.classList.remove('bright-mode');
                    document.body.classList.add('dark-mode');
                }
                
                renderCandles();
                updateStats();
            }
        }

        function resetGame() {
            if (confirm('Reset? You will lose progress!')) {
                document.body.classList.remove('bright-mode');
                document.body.classList.add('dark-mode');
                initGame();
            }
        }

        function tryAgain() {
            hideCelebration();
            document.body.classList.remove('bright-mode');
            document.body.classList.add('dark-mode');
            initGame();
        }

PART 3 of 3 (FINAL PART) - COPY THIS:

html
        function showCelebration() {
            clearInterval(timerInterval);
            document.getElementById('finalMoves').textContent = moveCount;
            document.getElementById('finalTime').textContent = document.getElementById('timeDisplay').textContent;
            
            let candleEmojis = '';
            for (let i = 0; i < totalCandles; i++) {
                candleEmojis += '';
                if ((i + 1) % 6 === 0 && i !== totalCandles - 1) candleEmojis += '<br>';
            }
            document.getElementById('celebrationCandles').innerHTML = candleEmojis;
            
            document.getElementById('celebrationOverlay').classList.add('show');
            
            // Confetti
            for (let i = 0; i < 100; i++) {
                setTimeout(() => {
                    const particle = document.createElement('div');
                    particle.textContent = ['', '', '', '', '', ''][Math.floor(Math.random() * 6)];
                    particle.className = 'particle';
                    particle.style.left = Math.random() * window.innerWidth + 'px';
                    particle.style.top = '-50px';
                    particle.style.fontSize = (25 + Math.random() * 25) + 'px';
                    particle.style.animation = `particleFall ${2 + Math.random() * 3}s linear forwards`;
                    document.body.appendChild(particle);
                    setTimeout(() => particle.remove(), 5000);
                }, i * 20);
            }
        }

        function hideCelebration() {
            document.getElementById('celebrationOverlay').classList.remove('show');
        }

        function shareToInstagram() {
            const text = `I lit all ${totalCandles} candles in the ${settings.label}! \n\nMoves: ${moveCount}\nTime: ${document.getElementById('timeDisplay').textContent}\n\nCan you beat me?\n\n@orouk.sami #PotionSort #CandleChallenge`;
            
            if (navigator.share) {
                navigator.share({
                    title: 'Candle Challenge',
                    text: text,
                    url: window.location.href
                }).catch(() => {});
            } else {
                alert(' Share this:\n\n' + text);
            }
        }

        function goBack() {
            if (window.history.length > 1) {
                window.history.back();
            } else {
                window.location.href = '/';
            }
        }

        initGame();
    </script>
</body>
</html>
